name: Cyclops Puzzle - Scaring Cyclops with Ulysses
title: Cyclops Puzzle - Scaring Cyclops with Ulysses
description: Reach Cyclops Room and scare cyclops away by saying 'Ulysses' (Odyssey reference)

expectedBehavior.cyclopsRoom: Room with exit northwest and staircase up, cyclops blocks staircase
expectedBehavior.cyclopsDescription: Cyclops looks prepared to eat horses, not very friendly
expectedBehavior.ulyssesCommand: The cyclops, hearing the name of his father's deadly nemesis, flees the room by knocking down the wall on the east of the room.
expectedBehavior.result: New exit EAST opens to Living Room (shortcut)
expectedBehavior.treasureRoom: Staircase UP leads to Treasure Room (Thief's lair)
expectedBehavior.literaryReference: References Homer's Odyssey where Odysseus/Ulysses blinded Polyphemus the cyclops

notes: Cyclops is NOT fed - he is scared away by saying 'Ulysses' or 'Odysseus'
References The Odyssey: Odysseus blinded Polyphemus (cyclops son of Poseidon)
Cyclops knocks down east wall, creating shortcut to Living Room
Staircase up leads to Treasure Room where Thief stores stolen items
Must navigate maze to reach Cyclops Room from Troll Room
Troll combat is random - may need multiple attempts

metadata.conversionNote: Converted from 'commands' format to 'entries' format - expectedOutput fields need to be populated
